item.text: The Lord’s message came to me:

“As for <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, are you willing to <st data-num="08199" class="">pronounce judgment</st>?<n id="1" /> Are you willing to <st data-num="08199" class="">pronounce judgment</st> on the <st data-num="01818" class="">bloody</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>?<n id="2" /> Then <st data-num="03045" class="">confront</st> her with <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> her <st data-num="08441" class="">abominable deeds</st>!
Then say, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: O city, who spills blood within herself (which brings on her doom), and who makes herself idols (which results in impurity),

you <st data-num="0816" class="">are guilty</st> because of the <st data-num="01818 0834">blood</st> you <st data-num="08210" class="">shed</st> and <st data-num="02930" class="">defiled</st> by the <st data-num="01544 0834">idols</st> you <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st>. You have <st data-num="07126" class="">hastened</st> the <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> of your doom;<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="05704" class="">end</st> of your <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> has <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="05921 03651">Therefore</st> I will <st data-num="05414" class="">make</st><n id="3" /> you an <st data-num="02781" class="">object of scorn</st> to the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st>, an <st data-num="07048" class="">object to be mocked</st> by <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">lands</st>.
Those both near and far from you will mock you, you with your bad reputation, full of turmoil.
“‘See how each of the princes of Israel living within you has used his authority to shed blood.

They have <st data-num="07043" class="">treated</st> <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> and <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="07043" class="">with contempt</st><n id="1" /> within you; they have <st data-num="06213 06233">oppressed</st> the <st data-num="01616" class="">resident foreigner</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> you; they have <st data-num="03238" class="">wronged</st> the <st data-num="03490" class="">orphan</st> and the <st data-num="0490" class="">widow</st><n id="2" /> within you.
You have <st data-num="0959" class="">despised</st> my <st data-num="06944" class="">holy things</st> and <st data-num="02490" class="">desecrated</st> my <st data-num="07676" class="">Sabbaths</st>!

<st data-num="07400" class="">Slanderous</st> <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> <st data-num="01961 04616 08210">shed</st> <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> within you.<n id="1" /> Those who live within you <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> pagan sacrifices <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains;</st><n id="2" /> they <st data-num="06213" class="">commit</st> <st data-num="02154" class="">obscene acts</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> you.<n id="3" />

They <st data-num="01540" class="">have sexual relations</st> with their <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="06172" class="">wife</st> within you;<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="06031" class="">violate</st> <st data-num="02931" class="">women</st> during their <st data-num="05079" class="">menstrual period</st> within you.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="0376" class="">One</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="06213" class="">commits</st> an <st data-num="08441" class="">abominable act</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> his <st data-num="07453" class="">neighbor’s</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>; <st data-num="0376" class="">another</st> <st data-num="02154" class="">obscenely</st> <st data-num="02930" class="">defiles</st> his <st data-num="03618" class="">daughter-in-law</st>; <st data-num="0376" class="">another</st> <st data-num="06031" class="">violates</st><n id="2" /> his <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st>—his <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st><n id="3" />—within you.
They take bribes within you to shed blood. You engage in usury and charge interest; you extort money from your neighbors. You have forgotten me, declares the Sovereign Lord.
“‘See, I strike my hands together at the dishonest profit you have made and at the bloodshed they have done among you.
Can your heart endure or can your hands be strong when I deal with you? I, the Lord, have spoken, and I will do it!

I will <st data-num="06327" class="">scatter</st> you among the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st> and <st data-num="02219" class="">disperse</st> you among various <st data-num="0776" class="">countries</st>; I will <st data-num="08552" class="">remove</st> your <st data-num="02932" class="">impurity</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> you.<n id="1" />
You will be profaned within yourself in the sight of the nations; then you will know that I am the Lord.’”
The Lord’s message came to me:

“<st data-num="01121" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> has <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> <st data-num="05509" class="">slag</st> to me. <st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> of them are like <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st>, <st data-num="0913" class="">tin</st>, <st data-num="01270" class="">iron</st>, and <st data-num="05777" class="">lead</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="03564" class="">furnace</st>;<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="01961" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="05509" class="">worthless slag</st> of <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st>.
Therefore this is what the Sovereign Lord says: ‘Because all of you have become slag, look out! I am about to gather you in the middle of Jerusalem.

As <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st>, <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st>, <st data-num="01270" class="">iron</st>, <st data-num="05777" class="">lead</st>, and <st data-num="0913" class="">tin</st> are <st data-num="06910" class="">gathered</st> <st data-num="0413 08432">in</st> a <st data-num="03564" class="">furnace</st> so that the <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st> can <st data-num="05301" class="">blow</st> on them to <st data-num="05413">melt</st> them, <st data-num="03651" class="">so</st> I will <st data-num="06908" class="">gather</st> you in my <st data-num="0639" class="">anger</st> and in my <st data-num="02534" class="">rage</st>. I will <st data-num="03240" class="">deposit</st> you there<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="05413" class="">melt</st> you.

I will <st data-num="03664" class="">gather</st> you and <st data-num="05301" class="">blow</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> you with the <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st> of my <st data-num="05678" class="">fury</st>, and you will be <st data-num="05413" class="">melted</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">in</st> it.
As silver is melted in a furnace, so you will be melted in it, and you will know that I, the Lord, have poured out my anger on you.’”
The Lord’s message came to me:

“<st data-num="01121" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st> to her: ‘<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> are a <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="04305" class="">receives</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="04305" class="">rain</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="01656" class="">showers</st> in the <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> of my <st data-num="02195" class="">anger</st>.’<n id="2" />

<st data-num="0834" class="">Her</st> <st data-num="05387" class="">princes</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="08432" class="">within</st> her are like a <st data-num="07580" class="">roaring</st> <st data-num="0738" class="">lion</st> <st data-num="02963" class="">tearing</st> its <st data-num="02964" class="">prey</st>; they have <st data-num="0398" class="">devoured</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">lives</st>. They <st data-num="03947" class="">take away</st> <st data-num="02633" class="">riches</st> and <st data-num="03366" class="">valuable things</st>; they have <st data-num="07235" class="">made many</st> women <st data-num="0490" class="">widows</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="08432" class="">within</st> it.

Her <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st> <st data-num="02554" class="">abuse</st> my <st data-num="08451" class="">law</st> and have <st data-num="02490" class="">desecrated</st> my <st data-num="06944" class="">holy things</st>. They do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0914" class="">distinguish</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> the <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> and the <st data-num="02455" class="">profane</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">recognize</st> any <st data-num="03045" class="">distinction</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> the <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st> and the <st data-num="02889" class="">clean</st>. They <st data-num="05956 05869">ignore</st><n id="2" /> my <st data-num="07676" class="">Sabbaths</st>, and I am <st data-num="02490" class="">profaned</st> in their <st data-num="08432" class="">midst</st>.

Her <st data-num="08269" class="">officials</st> are like <st data-num="02061" class="">wolves</st> in her <st data-num="07130" class="">midst</st> <st data-num="02963" class="">rending</st> their <st data-num="02964" class="">prey</st>—<st data-num="08210" class="">shedding</st> <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> and <st data-num="06" class="">destroying</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">lives</st>—<st data-num="04616" class="">so</st> they can <st data-num="01214" class="">get</st> <st data-num="01215" class="">dishonest profit</st>.
Her prophets coat their messages with whitewash. They see false visions and announce lying omens for them, saying, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says,’ when the Lord has not spoken.
The people of the land have practiced extortion and committed robbery. They have wronged the poor and needy; they have oppressed the resident foreigner and denied them justice.
“I looked for a man from among them who would repair the wall and stand in the gap before me on behalf of the land, so that I would not destroy it, but I found no one.
So I have poured my anger on them and destroyed them with the fire of my fury. I hereby repay them for what they have done, declares the Sovereign Lord.”
